typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SK_CustomerID as integer,
		CustomerID as integer,
		TaxID as string,
		Status as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleInitial as string,
		Gender as string,
		Tier as integer,
		DOB as date,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		PostalCode as string,
		City as string,
		StateProv as string,
		Country as string,
		Phone1 as string,
		Phone2 as string,
		Phone3 as string,
		Email1 as string,
		Email2 as string,
		NationalTaxRateDesc as string,
		NationalTaxRate as decimal(6,5),
		LocalTaxRateDesc as string,
		LocalTaxRate as decimal(6,5),
		AgencyID as string,
		CreditRating as integer,
		NetWorth as decimal(10,0),
		MarketingNameplate as string,
		IsCurrent as boolean,
		BatchID as integer,
		EffectiveDate as date,
		EndDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Cust
source(output(
		SK_CompanyID as integer,
		CompanyID as integer,
		Status as string,
		Name as string,
		Industry as string,
		SPrating as string,
		isLowGrade as boolean,
		CEO as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		PostalCode as string,
		City as string,
		StateProv as string,
		Country as string,
		Description as string,
		FoundingDate as date,
		IsCurrent as boolean,
		BatchID as decimal(5,0),
		EffectiveDate as date,
		EndDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Comp
source(output(
		TradeID as integer,
		SK_BrokerID as integer,
		SK_CreateDateID as integer,
		SK_CreateTimeID as integer,
		SK_CloseDateID as integer,
		SK_CloseTimeID as integer,
		Status as string,
		DT_Type as string,
		CashFlag as boolean,
		SK_SecurityID as integer,
		SK_CompanyID as integer,
		Quantity as decimal(6,0),
		BidPrice as decimal(8,2),
		SK_CustomerID as integer,
		SK_AccountID as integer,
		ExecutedBy as string,
		TradePrice as decimal(8,2),
		Fee as decimal(10,2),
		Commission as decimal(10,2),
		Tax as decimal(10,2),
		BatchID as decimal(5,0)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Trade
Cust derive(MessageType = iif(isNull(Tier)|| DOB<toDate(19170707, 'yyyy-MM-dd'),'Alert',''),
		MessageText = iif(isNull(Tier), 'Invalid customer tier','DOB out of range'),
		MessageData = iif(isNull(Tier), 'C_ID'+'='+toString(CustomerID)+'and'+'C_TIER'+'='+'Null','C_ID'+'='+toString(CustomerID)+'and'+'C_DOB'+'='+toString(DOB))) ~> DerivedColumn1
